meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>soldier</kanji> in a <kanji>squad</kanji> is a real <vocabulary>soldier</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>sailor</vocabulary>, unlike those "soldier" who are not in a squad. They don't have jobs, and can't be called real soldiers.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
